sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app id="home">
    <NavBar />
    <v-container fluid>
      <v-row>
        <v-col cols="2" class="menu-col">
          <v-navigation-drawer v-model="drawer" app>
            <v-list dense>
              <template v-for="(category, index) in categories">
                <v-list-group v-model="category.expanded" :key="index">
                  <template v-slot:activator>
                    <v-list-item-content>
                      <v-list-item-title>{{ category.name }}</v-list-item-title>
                    </v-list-item-content>
                  </template>
                  <v-list-item v-for="(option, optionIndex) in category.options" :key="optionIndex">
                    <v-list-item-content>
                      <v-list-item-title>{{ option.name }}</v-list-item-title>
                    </v-list-item-content>
                  </v-list-item>
                </v-list-group>
              </template>
            </v-list>
          </v-navigation-drawer>
        </v-col>
        <v-col cols="10">
          <v-img src="banner.webp" contain max-height="500px"></v-img>
        </v-col>
      </v-row>
    </v-container>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
import { defineComponent } from 'vue';

// Components
import NavBar from '../components/NavBar.vue'

export default defineComponent({
  name: 'HomeView',

  components: {
    NavBar,
  },
  data() {
    return {
      drawer: false, // Trạng thái của menu đa cấp
      categories: [
        {
          name: 'Điện thoại',
          expanded: false,
          options: [
            { name: 'Theo giá tiền' },
            { name: 'Theo hãng' },
          ],
        },
        {
          name: 'Laptop',
          expanded: false,
          options: [
            { name: 'Theo giá tiền' },
            { name: 'Theo hãng' },
          ],
        },
        {
          name: 'Tivi',
          expanded: false,
          options: [
            { name: 'Theo giá tiền' },
            { name: 'Theo hãng' },
          ],
        },
        {
          name: 'Âm thanh',
          expanded: false,
          options: [
            { name: 'Theo giá tiền' },
            { name: 'Theo hãng' },
          ],
        },
        {
          name: 'Đồng hồ',
          expanded: false,
          options: [
            { name: 'Theo giá tiền' },
            { name: 'Theo hãng' },
          ],
        },
        {
          name: 'Camera',
          expanded: false,
          options: [
            { name: 'Theo giá tiền' },
            { name: 'Theo hãng' },
          ],
        },
        {
          name: 'Phụ kiện',
          expanded: false,
          options: [
            { name: 'Theo giá tiền' },
            { name: 'Theo hãng' },
          ],
});
</script>
<style>


</style>
